description: Named after Black Diamond Athlete Babsi Zangerl’s badass ascent of Speed Integrale (9a), this tank is built to crush. Featuring a breathable, stretchy, quick-drying fabric, you can flow through moves and recover easily no matter whether you’re in a yoga studio or on the rock. A lat-clearing Y-back cut adds extra mobility and the slight drop-tail hem makes this tank harness compatible for the send.
name: Integrale Tank - Womens

specs.key: Polyester Slub Jersey with Quick Dry Finish
